attributes.action: To change the way we vote in the UK to a more democratic system
attributes.background: As part of our DS GCSE we have been exploring the different types of voting systems and come to the conclusion that the First Past the Post system we use in the UK doesn't correctly represent the views of the British people As a group we feel that we should change to a more democratic system.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. We are not sure what kind of system you would like to replace first past the post. 

You might be interested in signing this petition on introducing a system of proportional representation https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/121810

Or you could start a new petition calling for the specific change you would like to the voting system.
